titles.title: There's a deep down cry, there's a cry in my heart

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There's a deep down cry,
There's a cry in my heart
To be free from sin and death.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
So open my eyes to behold
The thing You're doing in the earth.
Open my ears that I might hear Your voice so still.
Open my eyes to behold
the thing You're doing in the earth.
There's a deep down cry to be free.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
To be free, to be free,
There's a deep down cry to be free.
